评论详情: Perfect fitting and nice quality!
Bought for my husband for Christmas and he loves wearing it because it runs big and is nice and soft.  Color and fit are great for a casual washed/ faded look.

Like the feel and the fabric.  Was exactly as advertised, super soft.  Unfortunately did have to return.  Grand daughter thought she could wear a Small mens'.  Definitely didn't realize it was really long.  Reordered a Small Cropped women's hoodie in pastel pink.  W
GOOD AND HEAVY
Love this hoodie's comfort and acid washed color. It is definitely worth it.
I bought this for my granddaughter for Christmas and she loves it!
Very cozy! Too washed off, the brown is barely noticeable. Real oversized!
Good quality and color accurate Fit was great
Material is very soft but I don’t think it’s worth $50
My daughter liked it and had picked it out. Its a simple sweatshirt hoodie at midweight.

评论概述: Ordered XL and it’s nice and chunky maybe a liiiitle too big
评论详情: Tbh I was really nervous about this one after reading the reviews, the inside seemed to look super cheap and scratchy. But it was too late to send it back before Christmas so I just hoped my bf would like it ! and OH MY GOSH I love it. It’s sooooo soft inside and out. I also was worried it was gonna be a thin sweatshirt Wich is also not the look I was going for, but no it’s thick, soft, chunky and warm. I’ll def be stealing it from him lollll ☺️☺️
The boxy fit is exactly what my teen wanted. Large hood and oversized fit. The color was great too. We got the forest green and it looked distressed which was perfect
Was expecting it to look like the picture. It’s more a faded blue. Was bigger than expected didn’t like the material wasn’t soft or thick.
I like the shirt but it was so wrinkled I had to wash it before I could give it as a gift. It should not be sent shrink wrapped.
The swetshsirt was not at all a washed look like shown in the pictures they give. It was plain red.
Seriously the nicest hoodie I’ve bought in a while, it’s the perfect thickness, not too hot but not thin, got a medium for oversized look, normally wear a small, fits perfectly!!
This hoodie is perfect for school use. There is no large label and the design is a simple solid color.  This is working great even now during the winter. Overall, this is worth the price value.

This is a super comfy and cozy hoodie. We all know that that hoodie that is over 10 years old that we all have is incredibly comfortable because it's been worn for so long, but also it's starting to look a little raggedy. This sweater is really nice because the acid wash actually gives it that worn in look without looking scraggly. The fit is true to size and so far I'm really pleased with it. I think it's a good quality sweater that you could definitely compare with something you'd buy at Old Navy, let's say.

This old-style, comfortable and thick hoodie will become a favorite of mine during severe winter. I have worn it at home when the temperature falls and appreciate its faded color; very bright colors are not my preference. Size fits very well, I would suggest to follow guidelines given. Another good thing is that colors don't lose brightness, different from some less expensive materials. In total a strong suggestion. :)
Really nice and really soft hoodie. I love it
My teen asked for the hoodie and it is exactly what he was hoping for and wears it all the time. His brother even borrows it. The stonewashed color is subtle and just right.
This is a super comfy and warm oversized style hoodie. The fabric is soft and it washes well. The color is cool and it has a distressed look to it.
I love everything about this sweatshirt. It’s super soft, warm, and the color is fantastic. It’s a bit pricey for me, but I do plan on getting more.

This shirt is so adorable, and extremely comfortable. I love wearing it. The quality is great and I cannot argue with the price. All in all a great closet staple! Love The warmth and the oversized fit.

The DNZZS acid wash hoodie is a very soft, cotton blend, hoodie.The hoodie I received for review was in a dark green.  The fabric was extremely soft sweatshirt material--38% Cotton, 57% Polyester, and 5% other fibers.  The Hoodie has a generous sized hood without integraged strings to tighten it.  Sleeves have ribbed cuffs and the waist is also cuffed.  There is a front hand warmer but no other pockets.The fit is loose/generous, so you may want to size down.  I liked the looser fit as I found it comfortable.  The medium weight fabric lends a nice amont of warmth.  It washed well with minimum shrinkage.Overall, this is a very nice hoodie.  Recommended.

Very nice hoodie, somehow I ordered a larger size than needed but I gave it to my son instead of husband and my son was very happy with the accident! He said the material is soft inside and out. We got the green and its like a dark army green shade. I've washed it several times and my son thinks it may have shrunk a tiny bit, but since it already has a vintage acid wash look, it still looks just like it did when he got it.
love this color red and the quality is *chefs kiss* probably the most stolen hoodie from my boyfriends closet, sizing is spot on for men!

Vintage, Comfy and Heavy! Will be one of my go to hoodies when real cold winter hits. I've used it around the house when it gets chilly and love the acid washed out color, bright vibrant colors ain't for me. Sizing is perfect, I would recommend using the guidelines provided.  Another benefit is that the colors do not fade, unlike some cheaper materials. Overall a solid recommendation! :)
Love this hoodie and the look! Awesome quality fits perfect
This hoody is so thick and soft that it's become my favorite! It's nice and big and doesn't restrict movement at all. The hood is nice and big too. Love it!
This acid wash hoodie is amazing! Super soft and comfy, plus it's oversized for a relaxed fit. The pink color is cool too.  Definitely recommend!
Quality hoodie. Thick warm heavy duty fabric!! Really nice acid design subtle and not too much! Baggy fit. Comfortable to wear all day!

评论概述: Comfy, soft, vibrant colors, and easy to wash
评论详情: Not much more than you could want in a hoody but that is cozy and easy to launder, and this one is perfect on both counts.

I love this sweatshirt! Sometime oversized sweatshirts aren’t quite as oversized because I am more plus sized but this sweatshirt is perfect! The outside has that nice worn in look without being sloppy because of the acid wash and the inside is SO SOFT. It feels like your favorite sweatshirt that you’ve had for 10 years but it’s brand new! I love love love love love it!

This roomy hoodie is crafted with care. If you prefer a more fitted style, I recommend going one size smaller than your usual size. The quality is impressive, with sturdy stitching and a heavy fabric that seems durable. It has a fantastic aesthetic, especially if you like that vintage or worn-in vibe.  It's cozy and warm, and I'm excited to wear it this fall.
Fits as expected. Good quality. Decent weight. Warm. Does not feel cheap at all.

评论概述: Nice quality non-branded hoodie at a premium, designer price
评论详情: Dnzzs Acid Wash Hoodie Super Soft Hoodie for Mens Hoodies Oversized Men's Fashion Hoodies & Sweatshirts Vintage Hoodie  Price at time of review: $49.99  This is a nice quality hoodie, well-made of thick, soft, comfortable cotton. The pink is bright and vibrant, the fit is great and runs true to size based on the size chart. After a couple of washes, it still looks new. The only detraction from a 5-Star review is the price, which would be more indicative of a name brand sweatshirt.
Love the wash and fit. Super cozy and comfortable!!
The fabric has a silk like texture.

This fits well and is fairly heavy and warm. I will say I personally wasn’t a fan of the acid washing once I was able to see it up close. To me, it makes the hoodie appear old and dirty which is not what I was expecting. Maybe this is the new fad and others will like it? I’m sure to still wear it around the house though as it is comfy. It seems well made also. The styling is mostly my fault for taking the chance and a matter of personal preference so I would still give it 4/5
I ordered this in a medium instead of a normal size large. I did not want that oversize look..it fits good except the back is a bit short on a average size person.
this sweatshirt is lovely, super nice and well made. oversized and fits great! i love it. good price and i absolutely love the color. couldnt be happier!

Oversized hoodies are "in" these days, but I played it safe and ordered this one size smaller than I would normally wear, as suggested under the seller's sizing chart. I ordered the small, and it fits me great. It's still loose fitting in the way a good hoodie should be, but at least I'm not swimming in it.  It's a comfortable hoodie. The inside material is extremely soft, and the outside feels soft too. It is well made and nicely warm.  I ordered the pink because I didn't already own a pink hoodie. The color is a soft pink, and I like it.

I was really surprised at the quality of this sweater. Upon unpackaging my first response was, wow. The inside fabric is warm and cozy and the outer style is really cool. It fits well. Very happy with this sweater. The color is nice and it’s very thick.

Dnzzs Acid Wash Hoodie Super Soft Hoodie is a good quality hoodie, not light weight, but what you used to get when you bought sweats decades ago. I got an extra large, but probably should have gotten just a large as they run a little big. I'll definitely have to layer with this, but I'm so glad I own it. It has the front pocket, and I expect it will be great for keeping warm.
Hey, order this right now, okay? It's soft and super warm. Dreamy. Buy one in every color and go!

Super comfortable . Soft but heavy. Fit perfectly but I went a size down because I didn’t want it as big and it worked out. The quality is great and the color is definitely acid wash  , almost like a heather look. Looks great . Highly recommend, would definitely buy in other colors.

I recently got the Dnzzs Acid Wash Super Soft Hoodie for Men for my son, and it has been a fantastic choice. Here’s my review:  Fit: The hoodie fits perfectly, providing a great fit that my son loves. Style: It is incredibly stylish, with a modern black color that looks trendy and fashionable. Comfort: The hoodie is super comfortable, making it a favorite for my son to wear. Durability: After washing, it didn’t shrink, which is a huge bonus.

评论概述: Super comfortable fabric. Order in Western sizes
评论详情: I am surprised by how comfortable this hoodie is. The fabric is extremely soft and cushiony. I ordered an XL because I assumed it may follow the trend of non-western sizes (fitting small). I got an XL when I would normally get a Large from a western clothing brand. It was a mistake. The XL is comically large.

This hoodie is awesome. I ordered my normal size, and putting it on it was an actual oversized fit. Looks way better than just sizing up on a regular hoodie. It's super comfortable and the acid washed look is awesome.  As it says, it does come wrinkled because it's shrink wrapped. No worries, I'll just steam it.

Depending on how generously sized something is, I will usually take either large (if generous) or X-large if sized correctly. Ad stated that this was oversized, so I ordered large, and it fits just fine. Nice for cooler weather, and I certainly would not rate this as a summer, of even cool summer evening type of hoodie, and would, if you are an east-coaster, put this is that fall/winter category, or something that you would wear just before the weather got cold enough for an actual coat.  For what it is, what it does, and what it costs: Five Stars  I am the Totally Unbiased Reviewer Dude (T.U.R.D.) and that is how I see it.

Pros: + Sizing seems very accurate. + Color is VIBRANT (at least with the pink). Looks still great after washing. + Super soft, the outside is a silky feeling sort of fabric, and the whole thing is lined with a slightly fuzzy material.  Cons: - Nothing acid wash about the pink one I received.  Could go either way: ~ Material is quite thick. I live in the south and this is definitely a winter sort of hoodie and not something we'd use very much. But if you lived somewhere more cold, I could see this being something you'd get a lot of use out of.

This hoodie is well made and fits nicely, for being a 2x it's oversized and closer to a 3x which is perfect for me because I've been losing weight, and my shirt size is currently somewhere between 2x and 3x.

评论概述: Very soft and comfortable on the inside.
评论详情: Very soft fabric on the inside. Very comfy and cozy. Fit is spot on. Color (green) is a nice shade of green. No defects or missed seams.

评论概述: Very nice, super soft after a wash
评论详情: Very comfy, definitely oversized but not a weird cut or anything. No drawstrings which is a big plus for me. I usually buy Large hoodies and this fit just shy of an XL for my dorito frame. A little stiff at first, I believe due to the acid washing. Yo can see the original color on the inside of the hoodie, which is way softer than the outside UNTIL you give is a nice wash and break it in some. Perfect hoodie to overuse and wear in to make even more vintage. 4 stars, very good, better than average (especially for a generic brand), and slightly shy of a perfect. 4.5 if I could.

This is a really nice hoodie, well made, thick material, generous sizing, lovely color, and soft. My only complaint is that the vacuum packed shipping created such wrinkles in the material it was ridiculous. Even after washing, the wrinkles, although not as severe, they still remained, and required ironing. OR perhaps soaking overnight may have removed them, but doubtful. For that reason, 1 less star, because not everyone has an iron.

This hoodie is definitely oversized and SO comfortable. It's well made of a lightweight fabric that's perfect for cool weather. I'd say not cold weather, but it's also so roomy it could be easily put on over layers. It has that casual look you get when you wear your husband's hoodie. It's very stylish and it feels great on the skin.

This hoodie is just okay.  Unfortunately the one we received doesn't have much of an acid wash at all.  It just looks black.  The bigger problem is that it runs short, particularly in the back.  My son is a tall guy, 6'2"  and it's really rides up in the back on him.  Maybe it would be better for someone who's more in the 5'10" range.Other than that it's sewn well.  Just doesn't fit right.

I'm pleasantly surprised and pleased with this item. It's described as an oversized hoodie, and that description is accurate. My size is a men's between XL and XXL. I ordered the XL, and the item fits perfectly. It's soft against my skin, which makes it comfortable for me.

This hoodie is amazing. I love the way it feels, it is heavy but not super soft which I love because then I am less likely to overheat. The pink is super vibrant and it is an adorable oversized hoodie. I think it is super nice quality.

I like the loose fit of this hoodie, as well it is super warm, soft material and the hood provides good coverage and wind blocking.  The material is dense and a good quality. The outer pockets are roomy and overall the hoodie is good looking

First thing I noticed when grabbing the Amazon package from my porch with this sweatshirt in it was the weight.  While it feels heavy, it's actually not too thick.  This makes it a great sweatshirt for cold, but not freezing temps.  The fit is perfect.  I'm 6' and about 220 lbs.  While an XL is my normal size, I'll occasionally size up if I know it's not coming from a known US brand.  Since this is described as "oversized", I stuck with my normal size and it was the right choice.  I would say order your usual size unless you like things tight.  This came vacuum sealed, so it arrived super wrinkly.  While I don't prefer pre-faded clothing, they weren't overzealous with the process and it looks nice.  It doesn't have that kind of orange tint that you see when pre-fading gets out of hand and they use too much detergent or detergent with too much bleach.  This sweatshirt does not have a drawstring, which is something I have come to appreciate.  Really, the only thing I use drawstrings on my sweatshirts for is chewing on them.
Size small is for an extra wide 250lb man

Comfy and definitely over-sized. I typically wear an XL, I'm 5'7 and weigh about 190, so a few pounds overweight. Due to other reviews, I ended up ordering a Large and I'm glad I did. Even the Large is a little baggy on me. Not bad by any means, as I like my hoodies a bit over-sized so I can comfortably wear a long sleeve shirt or something underneath and not have it feel tight. As far as quality, it seems very decent. The hoodie is mid-weight in my opinion, and though it's not real cold her yet, it should keep me warm. We've had some cool mornings that require a sweatshirt, but it's not down into the 30s or 40s yet. Just some 50s mornings. Overall I'm happy with it so far. Material feels and looks good, and no imperfections in the material or stitching. And, I like the red color.
Comfortable. Baggy and heavyweight as described. Make sure to check the size before ordering. 10/10 recommend
Great hoodie. Thick material, soft and warm. The color is exactly as shown. It fits great with room for layering underneath.

The Dnzzs Acid Wash Hoodie is a great addition to my wardrobe. It’s soft, roomy, and extremely comfortable, making it perfect for everyday wear. The oversized fit gives it a relaxed, stylish look, while the vintage acid wash design adds a unique touch. Despite being heavyweight, it doesn’t feel too bulky, making it ideal for layering or wearing on its own. Overall, this hoodie is well-constructed and a fantastic option for anyone looking for a comfortable and fashionable piece.
Love how soft this hoodie is it's comfortable and the color is bright
So comfy and soft. I did not look like it has an acid wash design but still very nice looking. Has an oversized fit which is nice. The green is a nice color, perfect for GB gear.

I freaking love this sweatshirt. Absolute perfect “oversized, boyfriend sweatshirt”. Obsessed is an understatement. The color and wash is 100% accurate to the product photos (my photos make it look a bit more vibrant/bright than it actually is for some reason) It’s giving “worn in” in the best way. It’s also plenty oversized. I am a 5’7 female and ordered the small… which is perfectly oversized. I probably could’ve gotten away with a medium too…but much bigger than that and I might’ve looked like I was drowning in it, haha. But this size looks so good with jeans, sweats, etc.  It’s also super soft and cozy to wear. It’s not the thickest sweatshirt, but it does have some weight to it, and has the soft layer inside. It lays nicely on my body. I just know I’m going to wear this thing all the time this fall/winter. I will say that it is definitely on the more expensive end of things when it comes to price, especially for a sweatshirt…but it does look and feel like good quality, so I’d say it’s worth it!

When my husband said that he would wear a pink sweatshirt I knew that I had to order this! However, as we have experienced a lot with online shopping, ordering a 3X can be risky because sizing often is too small. But this sweatshirt is actually wide enough and long enough to be considered a 3X and it actually fits my husband. This is a thick and warm sweatshirt! I can't wait to see my husband rock this sweatshirt this winter!

This hoodie is top notch quality.  The material is def warm and feels nice on the skin.  I like the slight acid wash appearance as well, brings back the 80's vibe.  I am 6'4 and about 285 and the 2XL fits nicely.  A little roomie as described and its nice for relaxing around the house or going out to watch the kids baseball game.  Yes, the item arrives vacuum sealed and to be expect its a wrinkly.  Nothing a wash won't bring back.

评论概述: Bulky and comfy but came wrinkly from vacuum seal
评论详情: Overall, the wearability is great! I like the popping pink color and its cozy interior works for the brisk mornings ive been having. Needed a good washing out the bag, though, as they for some reason vacuum seal the whole hoodie, leaving it very wrinkly at first. However, if your looking for a bulky styled hoodie, this is a good choice!
Sweatshirt runs big so size down unless you want it oversized. It is comfy but its not very thick it's more a cool day sweatshirt not made for winter.

I would wear a size large, but these hoodies are typically over-sized, so I ordered a medium. It fits perfect! It went' through the wash just fine and didn't loose any color. All the seams are heavy duty and the fabric is thick and soft.  The 'acid wash' effect is subtle and gives it a worn in look. While it is very well made, I do feel that the cost is a little high ($50), so I'd grab it when it's on sale or has a coupon.

This acid-washed hoodie really is nice. The material does require steaming before wearing. The hoodie looks aged and broken into, which is its appeal. Looking vintage as it is, it's hard to believe it's a 'new' hoodie.

I was expecting something of fairly low quality, but wow was I pleasantly surprised by this. Nice, subtle acid wash effect, and it fits true to size. Very soft and warm, and it's retained its feel and size very well after the initial wash we just put it through.

评论概述: Great quality hoodie with a trendy fit
评论详情: This acid wash hoodie is designed with an oversized fit, this vintage-style pullover combines comfort with a trendy, worn-in look. The heavyweight fabric ensures warmth and durability, making it perfect for casual wear in cooler weather. Whether you’re lounging at home or stepping out, this hoodie adds a touch of edgy fashion.
